vulnerability.name: USN-4038-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4038-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in bzip2. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Aladdin Mubaied discovered that bzip2 incorrectly handled certain files.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  (CVE-2016-3189)   It was discovered that bzip2 incorrectly handled certain files.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  (CVE-2019-12900)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in bzip2. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
